author: Pitch Meeting
description:
Step inside the pitch meeting that led to The Gorge!

Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

Apple Studios has been making some quality content (looking at you, Severance) and now they’ve launched themselves into the realm of sci-fi/horror/romance/shooter/action? The Gorge has a lot going on (none of it throat-related.)

The Gorge definitely raises some questions. Like why did they make them navigate over 40km if they wanted to keep the location a secret? Why aren’t the two snipers allowed to communicate on cooperative task with such high stakes? Why didn’t those spiders try to climb The Gorge? Why did the CEO show up at The Gorge to oversee unmanned drones?

To answer all these questions and more, step inside Ryan George’s Pitch Meeting for The Gorge!

title: The Gorge Pitch Meeting
